body_html: Does it address the possible hangs of index_queue.put or for data_queue.get? Usually it's data_queue.get that can hang, but in some corner cases (like priming) index_queue.put can hang too (in the case all worker threads are waiting on something, say, on data_queue.put).
body_text: Does it address the possible hangs of index_queue.put or for data_queue.get? Usually it's data_queue.get that can hang, but in some corner cases (like priming) index_queue.put can hang too (in the case all worker threads are waiting on something, say, on data_queue.put).
body: Does it address the possible hangs of `index_queue.put` or for `data_queue.get`? Usually it's `data_queue.get` that can hang, but in some corner cases (like priming) `index_queue.put` can hang too (in the case all worker threads are waiting on something, say, on `data_queue.put`).
